HDG.MA.content: we are easily thought-less, an uncanny visitor (comes/goes everywhere today) > “man today is in flight from thinking” [Dr. Schreber’s bellowing miracle]
HDG.MA.linkedContent: we are easily thought-less, an uncanny visitor (comes/goes everywhere today) > “man today is in flight from thinking” [Dr. Schreber’s bellowing miracle]

HDG.MA.content: if hydrogen bombs don’t explode, uncanny change in world moves upon us > what is most uncanny: (not technical advance itself) being unprepared for transformation, inability to confront what’s dawning meditatively
